title: Pink peppercorn and vodka pickle
description: Serve this Scandi-style pickle with rye crisp breads, smoked salmon and extra dill for a bright and beautiful starter.
ingredients: 1 small bunch finely chopped fresh dill

method.Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together the vodka, white wine vinegar, caster sugar, salt, pink peppercorns and dill until the sugar and salt have dissolved.

method.Step 2: Add the radishes and cucumber, peeled into ribbons. Stir, then set aside for 10-15 minutes. Serve scattered with extra dill.
